markdownRemark.html:
A few years ago, being an "enterprise developer", I attended a meeting about the IT strategy up to 2020. Here we heard about "innovating by consolidating".

I immediately thought of this statement as a contradiction (I suspect I didn't voice my concerns back then, after all, I was on layer 7 of the organisation while the CTO was on layer 2 or 3).

frontmatter.title: Typescript type shenanigans 2: specify at least one property
